The 15th ETSF Young Researchers' Meeting 2018

June 4 - June 8, 2018, Hamburg, Germany

About the Young Researchers' Meeting

The Young Researchers’ Meeting (YRM) of the European Theoretical Spectroscopy Facility (ETSF) is an annual conference organized and attended exclusively by researchers without permanent position that work on state-of-the-art theoretical and computational methods for the study of electronic and optical properties of materials.
Conference

Speakers from the theoretical spectroscopy community

Industry Session

Invited companies will present their ideas and give an insight into industrial research.

Poster Session

Have discussions and learn new perspective in a one-to-one manner.

Open Session

Talk about what really boosted your daily routine and you want other people to know.

Scientific Speed Dating

Explain your work to others and hear what they do in five minutes.

Get together

Meet the community and find new collaborators during the breaks or one of the many social events.
